member.name: T:OFIQ.Native.Interop.OFIQNative
member.summary: Provides P/Invoke declarations for the OFIQ native library.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Native.Interop.OFIQNative.Initialize(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the OFIQ library with the specified configuration.
member.param: The directory containing the configuration file.
The name of the configuration file.
member.returns: A return status indicating success or failure.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Native.Interop.OFIQNative.AssessQuality(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityAssessment@)
member.summary: Assesses the quality of a facial image.
member.param: The number of color channels (3 for RGB, 1 for grayscale).
Output parameter for the quality assessment results.
member.returns: A return status indicating success or failure.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Native.Interop.OFIQNative.AssessQualityWithPreprocessing(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityAssessment@,OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityPreprocessing@)
member.summary: Assesses the quality of a facial image with preprocessing results.
member.param: Output parameter for the quality assessment results.
Output parameter for the preprocessing results.
member.returns: A return status indicating success or failure.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Native.Interop.OFIQNative.Cleanup
member.summary: Releases resources associated with the OFIQ library.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Native.Interop.OFIQNative.GetVersion(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the version information of the OFIQ library.
member.param: Buffer to store the version string.
member.returns: The length of the version string, or -1 if the buffer is too small.

member.name: T:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnStatus
member.summary: Represents the return status from native OFIQ functions.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnStatus.Code
member.summary: The return code.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnStatus.ErrorMessage
member.summary: An optional error message.

member.name: T:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnCode
member.summary: Represents the return codes from native OFIQ functions.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnCode.Success
member.summary: Operation completed successfully.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnCode.Error
member.summary: Operation failed.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnCode.InvalidParameter
member.summary: Invalid parameter provided.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnCode.OutOfMemory
member.summary: Memory allocation failed.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnCode.ConfigurationError
member.summary: Configuration error.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.ReturnCode.UnsupportedImageFormat
member.summary: Image format not supported.

member.name: T:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityAssessment
member.summary: Represents the quality assessment results for a facial image.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityAssessment.MeasureCount
member.summary: The number of quality measures in the results.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityAssessment.Measures
member.summary: Pointer to the array of quality measure results.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityAssessment.OverallQuality
member.summary: The overall quality score (0-100).

member.name: T:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityPreprocessing
member.summary: Represents the preprocessing results for a facial image.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityPreprocessing.FaceCount
member.summary: The number of detected faces.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityPreprocessing.FaceBoundingBoxes
member.summary: Pointer to the array of face bounding boxes.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityPreprocessing.LandmarkCount
member.summary: The number of landmarks detected.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityPreprocessing.Landmarks
member.summary: Pointer to the array of landmark points.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceImageQualityPreprocessing.HeadPose
member.summary: The head pose angles (yaw, pitch, roll).

member.name: T:OFIQ.Native.Interop.HeadPoseAngles
member.summary: Represents head pose angles in degrees.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.HeadPoseAngles.Yaw
member.summary: Yaw angle (left-right rotation).

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.HeadPoseAngles.Pitch
member.summary: Pitch angle (up-down rotation).

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.HeadPoseAngles.Roll
member.summary: Roll angle (tilt rotation).

member.name: T:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceBoundingBox
member.summary: Represents a bounding box for a detected face.

member.summary: X coordinate of the top-left corner.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceBoundingBox.Y
member.summary: Y coordinate of the top-left corner.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceBoundingBox.Width
member.summary: Width of the bounding box.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceBoundingBox.Height
member.summary: Height of the bounding box.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Native.Interop.FaceBoundingBox.Confidence
member.summary: Confidence score of the detection.

member.summary: The quality measure identifier.

member.summary: The native quality score.

member.summary: The quality component value (0-100).
